run.attribute¶

class run.attribute.Attribute¶

Bases: builtins.object

Main base class for attributes.

This class is abstract base class for every attribute used in run. Abstract methods: __get__, __set__.

meta_builded¶

Build status of attribute (builded or not).

Attribute is builded after succefull __build__ call. It includes some internal building and __init__ call.

meta_dispatcher¶

Attribute’s dispatcher.

Dispatcher used to operate signals.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_docstring¶

Attribute’s docstring.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
meta_main_module¶

Attribute’s main module of module hierarchy.

meta_module¶

Attribute’s module.

meta_name¶

Attribute’s name.

Name is defined as attribute name in module. If module is None name will be empty string.

meta_qualname¶

Attribute’s qualified name.

Qualname is full attribute name in hierarhy starts from main module.

meta_type¶

Attribute’s type as a string.

run.attribute.copy(prototype, *args, **kwargs)¶

Copy prototype with optional args, kwargs altering.

For other types works as copy.copy.
